ValidationRule.description: Stopping product addition and manipulation and address changes to prevent sales tax from changing when the sales tax historical field is not blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Sales_Tax_Historical__c)), NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Order")), OR( ISCHANGED(Product_Count__c), ISCHANGED(Amount), ISCHANGED(Shipping_Address_NEW__c), ISCHANGED(Unique_Shipping_Addresses__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Since Sales Tax Historical is populated, you can not edit the product list or address without Sales Ops approval
